name: Saprophagous Shepherd
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 61, over the course of 72 hours. The theme was 'Egypt' and the limitation was combine 2 conflicting ideas.

 The two conflicting ideas we chose are 'Creating life' and 'Destroying life' and somehow this chaotic yet surprisingly entertaining mess of a game was created.

Feed your animals so they don't starve and they'll breed to make more animals! But sometimes they give birth to terrible monsters... Fighting, farming and fu-

Have fun!

CREDITS:
Mags - Art
Salvati - Music
Boffin - Programming

MUSIC: https://soundcloud.com/symeme/sets/saprophagous-shephard
